p: We then tested all available brain regions of muskox 15375 with a dual ISH protocol for the detection of BoAstV-CH13/NeuroS1 and BoAstV-CH15/OvAstV-CH16. Whereas our BoAstV-CH13/NeuroS1 [ 33] and BoAstV-CH15/OvAstV-CH16 [ 30] controls both reacted positively for the individual viruses, all muskox samples remained negative.
